info.title: Biz-Events Service
info.description: Microservice for exposing REST APIs about payment receipts.

get.summary: Retrieve the biz-event given the organization fiscal code and IUV.

parameters.name: organization-fiscal-code
parameters.description: The fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: iuv
parameters.description: The unique payment identification. Alphanumeric code that uniquely associates and identifies three key elements of a payment: reason, payer, amount

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Retrieve the biz-event given its id.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.description: Return OK if application is started

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: The organization get the receipt for the creditor institution using IUR.

parameters.name: organizationfiscalcode
parameters.description: The fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: iur
parameters.description: The unique reference of the operation assigned to the payment (Payment Token).

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: The organization get the receipt for the creditor institution using IUV and IUR.

parameters.name: organizationfiscalcode
parameters.description: The fiscal code of the Organization.

parameters.name: iur
parameters.description: The unique reference of the operation assigned to the payment (Payment Token).

parameters.name: iuv
parameters.description: The unique payment identification. Alphanumeric code that uniquely associates and identifies three key elements of a payment: reason, payer, amount

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Retrieve the paged transaction list from biz events.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Retrieve the transaction details given its id.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

post.summary: Disable the transaction details given its id.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

ApiKey.description: The API key to access this function app.
ApiKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
